talents.name: Energy Charge
talents.description: Recover 5% shield for each enemy Energy Orb hits.

talents.name: Contingency Plan
talents.description: For each 10% Shield lost, +5% Shield recovery speed and -5% recovery interval.

group1.name: Wildfire
description: After killing an enemy affected by any Elemental Effect, +40% RoF for 6s.
After killing an enemy affected by any Elemental Effect, +50% RoF for 6s.
After hitting an enemy affected by any Elemental Effect, +60% RoF for 6s.

group1.name: Elemental Rage
description: +30% DMG to enemies under any Elemental Effect.
+60% DMG to enemies under any Elemental Effect.
+120% DMG to enemies under any Elemental Effect.

group1.name: Energy Echo
group1.description: Energy Orb has the same element type as current weapon, and its Elemental Effect Chance is 100%.

group1.name: Pyrodominance
description: +40% Fire DMG.
+80% Fire DMG.
+120% Fire DMG.

group1.name: Electrodominance
description: +40% Lightning DMG.
+80% Lightning DMG.
+120% Lightning DMG.

group1.name: Acidominance
description: +40% Corrosion DMG.
+80% Corrosion DMG.
+120% Corrosion DMG.

group2.name: Backpack Expansion
description: +4 Smoke Grenade Capacity.
+8 Smoke Grenade Capacity.
+12 Smoke Grenade Capacity. Recover 1 grenade for every 2 grenades thrown.

group2.name: Hex Smoke
description: Enemies hit by Smoke Grenades deal -40% damage and take +20% damage for 6 seconds.
Enemies hit by Smoke Grenades deal -50% damage and take +40% damage for 6 seconds.
Enemies hit by Smoke Grenades deal -60% damage and take +60% damage for 20 seconds.

group2.name: Elemental Shield
description: After using the Smoke Grenade, +30 max shield and immunity to Elemental Effects for 6s.
After using the Smoke Grenade, +60 max shield and immunity to Elemental Effects for 6s.
After using the Smoke Grenade, +90 max shield and immunity to Elemental Effects for 20s.

group2.name: Toxic Smoke
group2.description: Smoke Grenades deal +300% base DMG and gain +100% base DMG per second after detonation.

group2.name: Acidic Explosion
group2.description: Enemies affected by your grenades become volatile and will explode after being defeated.

group2.name: Smoke Genius
description: Smoke Grenades last for 1 more second, and damage interval is decreased by 20%.
Smoke Grenades last for 2 more seconds, and damage interval is decreased by 30%.
Smoke Grenades last for 3 more seconds, and damage interval is decreased by 50%.

group3.name: Chained Duration
description: Energy Orb freezes enemies for 2 more seconds, and -30% cooldown time.
Energy Orb freezes enemies for 4 more seconds, and -30% cooldown time.
Energy Orb freezes enemies for 6 more seconds, and -30% cooldown time.

group3.name: Blinding Sphere
description: Explosion radius for Energy Orb is increased by +2m, freeze effect and DMG will bypass barriers. +50% Skill DMG for each target it hits.
Explosion radius for Energy Orb is increased by +4m, freeze effect and DMG will bypass barriers. +50% Skill DMG for each target it hits.
Explosion radius for Energy Orb is increased by +6m, freeze effect and DMG will bypass barriers. +50% Skill DMG for each target it hits.

group3.name: Power Source
description: Energy Orb gains 1 more charge.
Energy Orb gains 2 more charges.
Energy Orb gains 5 more charges.

group3.name: Energy Bolt
description: Energy Orb deals +200% damage. 50% chance to explode twice. 20% chance to explode 3 times. 15% chance to explode 4 times.
Energy Orb deals +400% damage. 50% chance to explode twice. 20% chance to explode 3 times. 15% chance to explode 4 times.
Energy Orb deals +600% damage. 50% chance to explode twice. 20% chance to explode 3 times. 15% chance to explode 4 times.

group3.name: Energy Blade
description: After casting Energy Orb, +300% weapon DMG on the next hit and deal +50% DMG to enemies adjacent to initial target.
After casting Energy Orb, +400% weapon DMG on the next hit and deal +75% DMG to enemies adjacent to initial target.
After casting Energy Orb, +500% weapon DMG on the next hit and deal +100% DMG to enemies adjacent to initial target.

group3.name: Advanced Shield
description: After casting Energy Orb, +30% Shield recharge speed and -30% Shield recharge delay for 6s. The process cannot be interrupted once recharging has started.
After casting Energy Orb, +60% Shield recharge speed and -60% Shield recharge delay for 6s. The process cannot be interrupted once recharging has started.
After casting Energy Orb, +90% Shield recharge speed and -90% Shield recharge delay for 20s. The process cannot be interrupted once recharging has started.
